about_the_game:
Download link for external action library of Px2d:.

[Px2d] is a frame animation editor specially designed for 2d pixel character animation.

Support 4-direction character production.
Three advantages of [Px2d].

Advantages 1. You can create your own characters without painting

Different from traditional pixel painting tools, you should first draw characters yourself, and then make character animation.

In [Px2d], you don't need to paint, and you don't need any painting experience. You can create your own character. [Px2d] Relying on the huge material library, there are a lot of materials for users to choose from. Just choose the materials you like, and you can create your own role.
Customize your role as you like.

Support importing user-defined materials

In addition to the materials in the material library, [Px2d] also supports users to import their own materials for animation.

Advantages 2. Say goodbye to a single template and create unlimited possibilities

Different from the traditional paper doll system, there is only one single fixed action template. Because the action is fixed and cannot be adjusted, it cannot meet our demand for action.
[Px2d] adopts the role body component mode. Every part of a character's body is a component. It can be adjusted at will. In this way, we can meet the needs of our actions to the greatest extent. If you want to do something, you can do it yourself.

In order to provide maximum convenience for everyone.

The 2.0 version of Px2d has upgraded its built-in action library, which includes 82 types of actions. It includes combat actions and life actions.

Advantages 3. One click export, greatly improving efficiency

[Px2d] Support one click to export png format pictures. No matter you have made any changes to the character style or the character action, you can export the resource with one click.

Support 4-direction character production.

name: Px2d

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows10
  • Processor: Intel Core2 Duo
  • Memory: 256 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Shader Model 3
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 256 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows10
  • Processor: Intel Core2 Duo
  • Memory: 512 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Shader Model 3
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 512 MB available space

short_description: [px2d] is an editor that specializes in making 2d pixel character animation. Currently, you can generate up to 4-direction roles. Support user-defined action templates. User defined material import is supported.
